title: This Is Us Season 4 Trailer Reveals Everything and Nothing
text: The trailer for season four of This Is Us has dropped, revealing a cast of brand new characters and leaving all of us wondering, “How exactly does M. Night Shyamalan factor into this?” Start guessing. Rounding out the ensemble are Marsha Stephanie Blake, Omar Epps, Bahara Golestan, Jennifer Morrison, and When They See Us standout Asante Blackk, with more characters likely to be revealed. This shouldn’t come as a surprise to fans of the show, as both star Milo Ventimiglia and show creator Dan Fogelman have hinted at the world of the series expanding in season four, but as the vaguely ominous trailer says, “If you think you know what’s coming next, you don’t know us.” We love a threatening tagline! This Is Us season four premieres September 24 on NBC.
description: This Is Us Season 4 trailer reveals new cast including M. Night Shyamalan and Jennifer Morrison, premiering on NBC this fall.
